plot outline: 'Nadir Paare Amar Bari' is the story of Raja who gets separated from his mother and brother. He is brought up by Swamiji. He gets a job at a colliery after he grows up. He falls in love with Seema. After lots of twists and turns he unites with his family.
title: Nadir Paare Aamar Bari
